attributes.action: Change in Policy so a Vote of No Confidence in MP's can be enforced.
attributes.additional_details: Though it hit 300,000 signatories, "Consider a vote of No Confidence in Jeremy Hunt, Health Secretary" was thrown out of debate for reasons above, as it was for the PM. The public feel increasingly angry that MP's can act with impunity, forcing policy through that goes against en masse public opinion, with no open debate or consequences for MP's who do so. Jeremy Hunt has avoided open debate with Junior Doctors on Imposition. Leading to public perception he is unfit or deceitful in his duties.
attributes.background: The Committee does not have power to debate on motions of no confidence. The Public, are increasingly frustrated that MP's aren't held accountable for their actions, especially when said actions are contrary to the will of the Public en Masse. Law must be changed to allow action on such individuals.
